refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: C interface function which checks if a parameter send to the C function is a scalar or not. You must include stack-c.h to benefit from this function.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: In this example, the C interface function takes one input parameters and prints the integer corresponding to the type of the variable sent as parameter in the Scilab console. If the test fails, we return from the C interface and an adequate error message is printed in the Scilab console.
